ExternalServiceRegistration.schema: {"openapi":"3.0.1","info":{"title":"GetAirlineById","description":"Action to get Airline info by ID"},"paths":{"/{AirlineByID}":{"get":{"description":"Get Airline Info by passing an Id","operationId":"Get Airline","parameters":[{"name":"AirlineByID","in":"path","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}],"responses":{"2XX":{"description":"Get Airline Info by passing an Id","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"established":{"type":"string"},"country":{"type":"string"},"website":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"head_quaters":{"type":"string"},"logo":{"type":"string"},"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"slogan":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}}}}
